meanings.sent1: The queen regna over her people with kindness and wisdom.
meanings.sent2: In fairy tales, the king regna over his kingdom with power and authority.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it could regna over the house, but the dog had other plans.
meanings.sent4: As the storm regna over the land, the trees bowed in submission to its might.
meanings.sent5: The sun regna over the sky, casting its warm light on all below.

meanings.sent1: The magical regna was filled with mystical creatures and enchanted forests.
meanings.sent2: Explorers set out to discover the hidden treasures of the ancient regna.
meanings.sent3: The regna of books in the library seemed to expand every time she visited.
